name: Seize the Day - A Modern FMV Game
blurb: A high quality full motion video game in a modern setting with moral weight. If it was the last day of your life, what would you do?

rewards.reward: Not Really a Pack Pack: Access to the Kickstarter backer forum at Fumovi.com where you'll receive special updates on the progress of the project
Pre-Order Pack:\r\nA copy of the game for iOS + access to the forum

Master Race Pack: Show your interest in a PC port of the game. A PC Port is not included in the budget, but interest in this reward will help direct where stretch goals are focused. If a PC version is developed, all backers of this pack will get a copy of the game for that platform. If a PC version is not developed you will receive a copy of the game for iOS + digital versions of the CD & DVD. Access to the forum is also included.
Digital Omnivore Pack: A copy of the game + digital versions of the Sountrack CD and Director's Cut video + access to the forum.
Poster Pack:\r\nA copy of the game + a signed 12" x 18" poster + access to the forum.
Pre-Order Bundle Pack: Five copies of the game to share with friends and family + access to the forum.
Movie Lovers Pack: A copy of the game + a copy of the script + a signed Director's Cut DVD featuring selected playthroughs + access to the forum.
Music Lovers Pack: A copy of the game + a signed collector's edition Soundtrack CD w/ full artbook + access to the forum.
Game Lover's Pack: A copy of the game + limited edition game case + limited edition manual + access to the forum.

Media Junkie Pack: A copy of the game + limited edition game case + limited edition game manual +a copy of the script + signed Director's Cut DVD + signed collector's edition soundtrack CD + access to the forum.

Community Manager Pack: A copy of the game + community manager status in the official forums [Note: I reserve the right to revoke community manager status if it is abused.] + access to the backer forum and a special community manager forum. The community manager forum will be the first place I go to every day in order to see what the community of backers wants to know. Guaranteed weekly direct interaction and responses to your questions. Community managers will also each receive a customized reward based on their overall contribution to the community. It could be anything from one of the other existing rewards to a one-of-a-kind souvenir from the game's production personalized especially for you!

Personal Touch Pack: A copy of the game + the chance to add your own personal touch to the game. You can mail in any one item and it will be included in the filming of the game, signed and returned to you. [Notes: Items must be free from trademark issues or they will not be used in the game. If there are trademark issues the item will still be signed and returned. International supporters welcome if return postage is included with the item mailed in.] + access to the forum.

Extra Pack: A copy of the game + the opportunity to appear as an extra in the game. [Notes: You will be given at least three filming dates to choose from. It your responsibility to arrange to be on set in the Los Angeles area on one of those days. Transportation is not included. Filming is expected to take place May-July 2013.] + access to the forum.
Superfan Pack: A copy of the game + signed Soundtrack CD + signed Director's Cut DVD + signed script + a prop used in the filming of the game w/ COA + access to the forum.

Producer Pack: A copy of the game + one set visit + personalized signed script+ invited to monthly Google chat where we discuss current game progress and upcoming decisions + invitation for you and a guest to the launch party. [Notes: You will be given at least three filming dates to choose from. It your responsibility to arrange to be on set in the Los Angeles area on one of those days. Filming is expected to take place May-July 2013. The launch party will also occur in the Los Angeles area. Transportation is not included.] + access to the backer, community manager and producer forums.

Executive Producer Pack: A copy of the game + open set visits + personalized signed script + personal monthly Google chat where we discuss current game progress and upcoming decisions + invitation for you and a 3 guests to the launch party. [Notes: You will be given at least three filming dates to choose from. It your responsibility to arrange to be on set in the Los Angeles area on one of those days. Filming is expected to take place May-July 2013. The launch party will also occur in the Los Angeles area. Transportation is not included.] + access to the backer, community manager, producer and executive producer forums.

Speaking Role Pack: A copy of the game + personalized script + a speaking role in the game. [Notes: You will be given at least three filming dates to choose from. It your responsibility to arrange to be on set in the Los Angeles area on one of those days. Transportation is not included. Filming is expected to take place May-July 2013.]  + access to the backer forum.
